content: My submission is taking a long time to load for such a short file. And it says next to it "C:\fakepath\ps0.py", that sounds odd?  Is there an error?
subject: Submission

content: resolved, make sure to save as python not text file

<md>resolved in student answer. 

The "C:\fakepath\ps0.py" is ok; it is a placeholder file path as the full path name on your local device is too long and unique to you, so for submission purposes, you might see fakepath as placeholder.</md>

Hi, I cannot see a submit button after uploading my PS and after answering the questions in the survey. My kerb is kimbece and it seems like I have not been added as a student yet. Any help is greatly appreciated.
I just gave you access to the class website, please submit now.
